page.title: 19B.W TRAD. GAMES - PART 2
page.content: You can play the game anywhere.The object of the game is to get as close to the centre as possible.To play{Peep Behind The Curtain}you need quite a lot of people.One person is chosen to stand with their back towards the rest of the children. The group of children start walking forward and then the other person turns round and if he sees anybody walking they are out.{Donkey}is the easiest game to play.All you need is a ball, a wall and two or more players.You get in single line,then you throw ball against the wall and when it bounces back you jump over it then the next person has a go and so on.{Whats the time Mr.Wolf}is similar to Peep behind the curtain. One person is chosen and the rest wait behind then they say,"Whats the time Mr Wolf.
